00028 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_cmnhdr.h" // SC_API
00029 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_macros.h" // SC_CONCAT_HELPER_, SC_STRINGIFY_HELPER_
00030 
00031 namespace tlm {
00032 
00033 enum SC_API tlm_phase_enum
00034 {
00035   UNINITIALIZED_PHASE=0,
00036   BEGIN_REQ=1,
00037   END_REQ,
00038   BEGIN_RESP,
00039   END_RESP
00040 };
00041 
00042 class SC_API tlm_phase
00043 {
00044 public:
00045   tlm_phase();
00046   tlm_phase(unsigned int id); // TODO: should be dropped
00047 
00048   tlm_phase(tlm_phase_enum standard);
00049   tlm_phase& operator=(tlm_phase_enum standard);
00050 
00051   operator unsigned int() const { return m_id; }
00052   const char* get_name() const;
00053 
00054 protected:
00055   // register extended phase
00056   tlm_phase( const std::type_info & type, const char* name );
00057 
00058 private:
00059   unsigned int m_id;
00060 };
00061 
00062 inline
00063 tlm_phase::tlm_phase()
00064   : m_id( UNINITIALIZED_PHASE )
00065 {}
00066 
00067 inline
00068 tlm_phase::tlm_phase( tlm_phase_enum standard )
00069   : m_id( standard )
00070 {}
00071 
00072 inline
00073 tlm_phase& tlm_phase::operator=( tlm_phase_enum standard )
00074 {
00075   m_id = standard;
00076   return *this;
00077 }
00078 
00079 inline
00080 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& s, const tlm_phase& p)
00081 {
00082   s << p.get_name();
00083   return s;
00084 }
00085 
00086 #define TLM_DECLARE_EXTENDED_PHASE(name_arg) \
00087   static class SC_CONCAT_HELPER_(tlm_phase_, name_arg) \
00088     : public ::tlm::tlm_phase \
00089   { \
00090     typedef SC_CONCAT_HELPER_(tlm_phase_, name_arg) this_type; \
00091   public: \
00092     SC_CONCAT_HELPER_(tlm_phase_, name_arg)() /* register extended phase */ \
00093       : ::tlm::tlm_phase( typeid(*this), SC_STRINGIFY_HELPER_(name_arg) ) \
00094     {} \
00095     \
00096     static const this_type& get_phase() /* needed only for IEEE 1666-2011 */ \
00097       { static this_type this_; return this_; } \
00098   } \
00099   const name_arg
00100 
00101 // for backwards-compatibility
00102 #define DECLARE_EXTENDED_PHASE( NameArg ) \
00103     TLM_DECLARE_EXTENDED_PHASE( NameArg )
00104 
00105 } // namespace tlm
